Line 56 in BusyIndicator is runnable.run(), so the runnable is null.
Filed bug 18005 for BusyIndicator.showWhile to check its args.

There is one more line in the stack which did not show up in the first 
stacktrace. The problem happened in PreferenceDialog.java:415 instead of 
BusyIndicator.java:56.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16666 ***
